bool Search::throttle ( bool  do_throttle = -1  ) 

Dual purpose set/get throttle.

If called without arguments, returns the current default throttle setting. If called with a boolean argument, sets the default throttle setting and returns it.

Parameters:
do_throttle The throttle setting to set the throttle to
Returns:
the current throttle value
